061@Command({ "tne", "myeco", "ecomenu", "ecomin", "ecoadmin", "ecomanage", "theneweconomy" })
062@Description("Admin.Main.Description")
063public class AdminCommand {
064
065  //@DefaultFor({ "tne", "myeco", "ecomin", "ecoadmin", "ecomanage", "theneweconomy" })
066  @Subcommand({ "ecomenu", "menu", "myeco" })
067  @Usage("Admin.MyEco.Arguments")
068  @Description("Admin.MyEco.Description")
069  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.menu")
070  public void onMyEco(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
071
072    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onMyEco(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
073  }
074
075  @Subcommand({ "help", "?" })
076  @Usage("Help.Arguments")
077  @Description("Help.Description")
078  public void help(final BukkitCommandActor actor, final Help.RelatedCommands<?> commands, @Default("1") final int page) {
079
080    BaseCommand.help(new BukkitCMDSource(actor), commands, page);
081  }

171  }
172
173  @Subcommand({ "old" })
174  @Usage("Admin.Restore.Arguments")
175  @Description("Admin.Restore.Description")
176  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.old")
177  public void old(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("0") final int extraction) {
178
179    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->restoreOld(extraction), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
180    new BukkitCMDSource(sender).message(new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Restoration"));
181  }
182
183  @Subcommand({ "save" })
184  @Usage("Admin.Save.Arguments")
185  @Description("Admin.Save.Description")
186  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.save")
187  public void save(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
188
189    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onSave(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
190  }
191

193  @Usage("Admin.Status.Arguments")
194  @Description("Admin.Status.Description")
195  @CommandPermission("tne.admin.status")
196  public void status(final BukkitCommandActor sender, final Account account, @Default("normal") final AccountStatus status) {
197
198    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onStatus(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), account, status);
199  }
200
201  @Subcommand({ "version", "ver", "build" })
202  @Usage("Admin.Version.Arguments")

205  public void version(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
206
207    net.tnemc.core.command.AdminCommand.onVersion(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
208  }
209
210
211  public static boolean restoreOld(@Nullable final Integer extraction) {
212
213    final File file = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "extracted.yml");
214
215    if(!file.exists()) {
216
217      PluginCore.log().inform("The extraction file doesn't exist.", DebugLevel.OFF);
218      return false;
219    }
220    YamlDocument extracted = null;
221    try {
222      extracted = YamlDocument.create(file);
223    } catch(final Exception e) {
224      PluginCore.log().error("Failed load extraction file for writing.", e, DebugLevel.OFF);
225    }
226
227    if(extracted == null) {
228      PluginCore.log().inform("The extraction file doesn't exist.", DebugLevel.OFF);
229      return false;
230    }
231
232    if(extracted.contains("Accounts")) {
233      final Set<Object> accounts = extracted.getSection("Accounts").getKeys();
234
235      final int frequency = (int)(accounts.size() * 0.10);
236      int number = 1;
237
238      final boolean recode = extracted.contains("Version");
239
240      for(final Object nameObj : accounts) {
241
242        final String name = (String)nameObj;
243        final String username = name.replaceAll("\\!", "\\.").replaceAll("\\@", "-").replaceAll("\\%", "_");
244        boolean nonPlayer = false;
245
246        UUID id = get(username);
247        if(id == null) {
248          nonPlayer = true;
249          id = UUID.randomUUID();
250        }
251
252        final AccountAPIResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(id.toString(), username, nonPlayer);
253        if(response.getAccount().isEmpty()) {
254          PluginCore.log().inform("Couldn't create account for " + username + ". Reason: " + response.getResponse().response(), DebugLevel.OFF);
255          continue;
256        }
257
258        final Set<Object> regions = extracted.getSection("Accounts." + name + ".Balances").getKeys();
259        for(final Object regionObj : regions) {
260
261          final String region = (String)regionObj;
262          final Set<Object> currencies = extracted.getSection("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region).getKeys();
263          for(final Object currencyNameObj : currencies) {
264
265            final String currency = (String)currencyNameObj;
266            if(!recode) {
267              final String finalCurrency = (currency.equalsIgnoreCase("default"))? TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency().getIdentifier() : currency;
268              final Optional<Currency> cur = TNECore.eco().currency().find(finalCurrency);
269
270              final Currency currencyObj = cur.orElseGet(()->TNECore.eco().currency().defaultCurrency(TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region)));
271
272              final BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(extracted.getString("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region + "." + currency));
273
274              response.getAccount().get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region), currencyObj.getUid(),
275                                                                        amount, EconomyManager.NORMAL), TNECore.eco().getFor(currencyObj, currencyObj.type()).get(0).identifier());
276            } else {
277
278              final Set<Object> types = extracted.getSection("Accounts." + name + ".Balances." + region + "." + currency).getKeys();
279              for(final Object typeObj : types) {
280
281                final String type = (String)typeObj;
282                final BigDecimal amount = new BigDecimal(extracted.getString("Accounts." + name
283                                                                             + ".Balances." + region
284                                                                             + "." + currency + "."
285                                                                             + type));
286
287                response.getAccount().get().setHoldings(new HoldingsEntry(region, UUID.fromString(currency),
288                                                                          amount, Identifier.fromID(type)));
289              }
290            }
291            number++;
292            try {
293              final boolean message = (number % frequency == 0);
294
295              if(message) {
296                final int progress = (number * 100) / accounts.size();
297                PluginCore.log().inform("Restoration Progress: " + progress, DebugLevel.OFF);
298              }
299            } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
300          }
301        }
302      }
303      PluginCore.log().inform("Restoration has completed!", DebugLevel.OFF);
304    }
305
306    return true;
307  }
308
309  protected static UUID get(final String name) {
310
311    for(final OfflinePlayer player : Bukkit.getServer().getOfflinePlayers()) {
312      if(player.getName() == null) continue;
313      if(player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
314        return player.getUniqueId();
315      }
316    }
317    return null;
318  }
319}
